text: The National Sport Center is a complex of sports venues and sport administration buildings in Tel Aviv, Israel. It includes the Olympic Committee of Israel building. The center is located in the Western edge of the Yarkon Park near to the Ramat Gan Stadium. It is a supplementary compound to the Wingate Institute in Netanya. The National Sport Center was established in 1978 when a several tennis courts were built close to Yarkon Park. In 1980, the building of the Olympic Committee of Israel and the national athletics stadium were built nearby. == Other websites == * National Sport Center â€“ Tel Aviv (Hebrew) * the Olympic Committee of Israel Category:Buildings and structures in Tel Aviv Category:Sports buildings Category:Sport in Israel Category:1978 establishments in Asia Category:1970s establishments in Israel
title: National Sport Center Tel Aviv
